languages.text: For the first several rounds after receiving an injury, a character will have only a fresh injury. Fresh injuries can be instantly healed with a medikit. If left untreated, a fresh injury turns into an old injury. Old injuries require a successful Medicae test to be healed.
languages.original_text: При получении ранения первые несколько раундов оно считается свежим. Свежие ранения можно мгновенно исцелить с помощью медкомплекта. Если этого не сделать, ранение станет старым. Чтобы излечить его, потребуется пройти проверку навыка Медицина.

traits.locale_text: For the first several rounds after receiving an injury, a character will have only a fresh injury. Fresh injuries can be instantly healed with a medikit. If left untreated, a fresh injury turns into an old injury. Old injuries require a successful Medicae test to be healed.

For the first several rounds after receiving an injury, a character will have only a fresh injury. Fresh injuries can be instantly healed with a medikit. If left untreated, a fresh injury turns into an old injury. Old injuries require a successful Medicae test to be healed.

For the first several rounds after receiving an injury, a character will have only a fresh injury. Fresh injuries can be instantly healed with a medikit. If left untreated, a fresh injury turns into an old injury. Old injuries require a successful Medicae test to be healed.

languages.text: Durante los primeros asaltos posteriores a una lesión, se mantendrá como lesión reciente. Las lesiones recientes pueden curarse al instante con un botiquín. Si no se trata, se convertirá en una lesión duradera y, para curarla, será necesario superar una prueba de Medicae.
languages.original_text: For the first several rounds after receiving an injury, a character will have only a fresh injury. Fresh injuries can be instantly healed with a medikit. If left untreated, a fresh injury turns into an old injury. Old injuries require a successful Medicae test to be healed.

traits.locale_text: Durante las primeras rondas posteriores a una lesión, se mantendrá como lesión reciente. Las lesiones recientes pueden curarse al instante con un botiquín. Si no se trata, se convertirá en una lesión duradera y, para curarla, será necesario superar una prueba de Medicae.

languages.text: 受到伤势的几个回合之内，该伤势会被视为新伤，可以使用医疗包立即治愈。如果该角色未能得到及时治疗，则新伤会变成旧伤。旧伤需要通过医疗检定才能成功治愈。
languages.original_text: For the first several rounds after receiving an injury, a character will have only a fresh injury. Fresh injuries can be instantly healed with a medikit. If left untreated, a fresh injury turns into an old injury. Old injuries require a successful Medicae test to be healed.

traits.locale_text: 受到伤势的几个回合之内，该伤势会被视为新的伤势，可以使用医疗包立即治愈。如果该角色未能得到及时治疗，则新的伤势会变成旧伤。旧伤需要通过医疗检定才能成功治愈。

languages.text: 負傷をしてから最初の数ラウンドは、そのキャラクターは生傷しか負わない。生傷はメディキットで即座に治すことができる。そのままにしておくと、生傷は古傷に変わる。古傷を治すにはメディケアの判定に成功する必要がある。
languages.original_text: For the first several rounds after receiving an injury, a character will have only a fresh injury. Fresh injuries can be instantly healed with a medikit. If left untreated, a fresh injury turns into an old injury. Old injuries require a successful Medicae test to be healed.

traits.locale_text: 負傷をしてから最初の数ラウンドは、そのキャラクターは生傷しか負わない。生傷はメディキットで即座に治すことができる。そのままにしておくと、生傷は古傷に変わる。古傷を治すにはメディケアの判定に成功する必要がある。

languages.text: In den ersten Runden nach dem Erhalt einer Verletzung hat ein Charakter nur eine frische Verletzung. Frische Verletzungen können sofort mit einem Medikit geheilt werden. Bleibt eine frische Verletzung unbehandelt, wird sie zu einer alten Verletzung. Um alte Verletzungen zu heilen, ist eine erfolgreiche Medicae-Probe erforderlich.
languages.original_text: For the first several rounds after receiving an injury, a character will have only a fresh injury. Fresh injuries can be instantly healed with a medikit. If left untreated, a fresh injury turns into an old injury. Old injuries require a successful Medicae test to be healed.

traits.locale_text: In den ersten Runden nach dem Erhalt einer Verletzung hat ein Charakter nur eine frische Verletzung. Frische Verletzungen können sofort mit einem Medikit geheilt werden. Bleibt eine frische Verletzung unbehandelt, wird sie zu einer alten Verletzung. Um alte Verletzungen zu heilen, ist eine erfolgreiche Medicae-Probe erforderlich.

languages.text: Pendant les quelques rounds qui suivent une lésion, le personnage souffre seulement d'une lésion récente. Les médikits permettent de soigner instantanément les lésions récentes. Toute lésion récente non soignée se transforme en lésion ancienne. Pour soigner une lésion ancienne, le personnage doit réussir un test de Medicae.
languages.original_text: For the first several rounds after receiving an injury, a character will have only a fresh injury. Fresh injuries can be instantly healed with a medikit. If left untreated, a fresh injury turns into an old injury. Old injuries require a successful Medicae test to be healed.

traits.locale_text: Pendant les quelques rounds qui suivent une blessure, le personnage souffre seulement d'une blessure récente. Les médikits permettent de soigner instantanément les blessures récentes. Toute blessure récente non soignée se transforme en blessure ancienne. Pour soigner une blessure ancienne, le personnage doit réussir un test Medicae.

languages.text: При получении ранения первые несколько раундов оно считается свежим. Свежие ранения можно мгновенно исцелить с помощью медкомплекта. Если этого не сделать, ранение станет старым. Чтобы излечить его, потребуется пройти проверку навыка Медицина.
languages.original_text: For the first several rounds after receiving an injury, a character will have only a fresh injury. Fresh injuries can be instantly healed with a medikit. If left untreated, a fresh injury turns into an old injury. Old injuries require a successful Medicae test to be healed.
